quotes.author: Plato
quotes.message: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
quotes.insight: Fear is often ignorance. Once you understand the risk, the fear vanishes. Knowledge is courage.

quotes.author: Jeff Bezos
quotes.insight: Stasis is death. Day 2 is stasis. Remain in the start-up phase of hunger forever.

quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.message: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
quotes.insight: Leverage beats brute force. Tooling and preparation save sweat and time.

quotes.author: Robert Greene
quotes.message: Win through your actions, never through argument.
quotes.insight: Arguments create resentment. Results create compliance. Show, don't tell.
